title: Zz'rot? More like...
body:
>#**GG'rot**

http://puu.sh/nrWgH/160fce4535.jpg

Thoughts on why Zz'rot was underpicked before and is now in a majority of matches?

replies.body: People are noobs and only pick meta. I've seen how effective this item is ever since it came out. Handy if your team comp is as shit as your teammates.

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IdhJblyM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-07T14:44:57.390+0000)
>
> People are noobs and only pick meta. I've seen how effective this item is ever since it came out. Handy if your team comp is as shit as your teammates.

Err, this item wasn't this effective when it came out because turrets weren't as weak as they are now. I've been using this item for a while as well, although it was much more situational last season.
This trick will only work around your rank. Players lower down don't have what it takes to play this way, they are all out for themselves.
